report.title: MNHNL Reptiles Samples List
report.description: Form Internal Report: Used by the Samples grid to retrieve the samples associated with a survey and user.
report.query: SELECT s.id as sample_id, array_to_string(array_agg(dtt.term::text), ',') as target_species, parent.name as square, l.name as location_name, sav1.text_value as creator, s.date_start, s.date_end, s.date_type FROM samples s INNER JOIN locations l ON l.id = s.location_id INNER JOIN locations parent ON parent.id = l.parent_id INNER JOIN sample_attribute_values sav1 ON sav1.sample_id = s.id AND sav1.sample_attribute_id = #userName_attr_id# and sav1.deleted = FALSE INNER JOIN samples s2 ON s2.parent_id = s.id AND s2.deleted = false INNER JOIN sample_attribute_values sav ON sav.sample_id = s2.id AND sav.deleted = false AND sav.sample_attribute_id = #target_species_attr_id# INNER JOIN detail_termlists_terms dtt ON sav.int_value = dtt.meaning_id AND dtt.preferred = true WHERE s.survey_id=#survey_id# AND s.deleted = FALSE AND s.parent_id IS NULL AND ((#userID# > 0 AND (EXISTS (SELECT id FROM sample_attribute_values sav2 WHERE sav2.sample_id = s.id AND sav2.sample_attribute_id = #userID_attr_id# AND sav2.int_value = #userID# AND sav2.deleted = FALSE))) OR (#userID# <= 0)) GROUP BY s.id, square, l.name, creator, s.date_start, s.date_end, s.date_type #order_by#

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for?
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: userID_attr_id
param.display: CMS User ID Sample Attribute ID
param.description: Sample Attribute ID used to Identify User

param.name: userID
param.description: CMS User ID: use -1 for superusers

param.name: userName_attr_id
param.display: CMS User Name Sample Attribute ID
param.description: Sample Attribute ID used to Identify User Name

param.name: target_species_attr_id
param.description: Sample Attribute ID used to Identify the Reptile Target Species
